activities.loc: Branch I, Courthouse Annex, Second Floor

chargeHist.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Paul Michael Pecore

records.addlTxt:
11:35 AM Defendant Paul Michael Pecore appeared by ZOOM, in custody.  Attorney Brian Thomas Stevens appeared by ZOOM for Paul Michael Pecore.  Attorney DeShea D. Morrow in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Court calls cases 22CF87 and 22TR610.
Atty Stevens heard - has received the discovery.
Deft is no longer requesting Atty Stevens to withdraw.
Atty Stevens heard  - Deft states there may be video from the Deft's house.
DA heard - no video recordings that she is aware of at this time.
Court schedules with parties.
11:40 AM
Status conference scheduled for November 28, 2022 at 10:30 am.

10:04 AM Defendant Paul Michael Pecore appeared by ZOOM video (@ MCJ).  Attorney Brian Thomas Stevens appeared by ZOOM video for Paul Michael Pecore.  Prosecuting attorney DeShea D. Morrow in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Atty Stevens is heard re: appearance by ZOOM w/o request
Atty Stevens is heard re: Def's request for him to be withdrawn
Court responds re: Public Def re-appointment
Def still wishes for Atty Stevens to be withdrawn
Parties discuss situation with Discovery
Court will schedule to allow time for Atty Stevens to obtain discovery from prior atty and discuss discovery/offer w/ Def
Def makes a statement; wishes new counsel
Court will proceed with Atty Stevens at this time
Atty Stevens allowed to appear by ZOOM at next hearing
10:15 AM
Status conference scheduled for October 28, 2022 at 11:30 am.

8:29 AM Defendant Paul Michael Pecore appeared by ZOOM, in custody.  Attorney Brian Thomas Stevens appeared by ZOOM for Paul Michael Pecore.  Prosecuting attorney Kathryn E Heineck in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
w/22CF87, 22TR610
Atty Steven heard on conference w/Deft - prior waiver of prelim, request arraignment.
Court finds waiver occurred 4-27-22 and proceeded w/arraignment on that same date/time.
Court heard scheduling STC today.
Parties agree.
Court schedules w/parties.
8:33 am
Status conference scheduled for October 11, 2022 at 10:00 am.

8:52 AM Prosecuting attorney DeShea D. Morrow in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Paul Michael Pecore by video in custody. 
Court calls case - Conflict with Public Defenders office and no atty appointed yet
08:54 AM
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 12, 2022 at 08:30 am.

8:33 AM Prosecuting attorney Kathryn E Heineck in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Paul Michael Pecore appeared by video, in custody. 
Court calls 22CF87 and 22TR610.
Court reviews attempts with public defender. 
No representation at this time. 
Court schedules with parties. 
8:34 AM
Status conference scheduled for August 8, 2022 at 08:30 am.

8:32 AM Prosecuting attorney DeShea D. Morrow in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Paul Michael Pecore appeared by video, in custody. 
Court calls case 22CF87 and 22TR610.
Deft spks- has not been able to hire an atty. 
Atty Spansail is being heard. 
Deft spks- has not had contact with PD office.
Does not believe that he will be able to pay for atty on his own. 
Deft must contact PD office. 
Court schedules with parties. 
8:35 AM
Status conference scheduled for July 11, 2022 at 08:30 am.

1:45 PM Prosecuting attorney DeShea D. Morrow in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Paul Michael Pecore in court, in custody.  Attorney Bradley J. Schraven in court for Paul Michael Pecore. 
Court calls cases 22CF87 and 22TR610.
Atty spks on Motion and Order to withdraw.
Deft seeking private counsel and potential conflict of interest.
Deft spks- wishes to seek new counsel and indicated that he does not know if he is able to hire an atty on his own. 
Court spks on process and potential delay in being appt an atty.
Court grants motion to withdraw and signs order. 
Atty advises deft of public defender policy- only 2 atty's will be appointed. 
Deft understands. 
Court schedules with parties. 
1:50 PM
Motion on postconviction relief hearing scheduled for June 13, 2022 at 08:30 am.

3:31 PM Defendant Paul Michael Pecore in court, in custody.  Attorney DeShea D. Morrow in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Bradley J. Schraven in court for Paul Michael Pecore. 
Court calls cases 22CF87 and 22TR610.
Atty Schraven heard - thought that cases were resolved, but has now been told that Deft does not want to accept the offer and resolve that matter.
DA heard - was also anticipating a resolution today.
Court heard and schedules with parties.
3:34 PM
Status conference scheduled for June 6, 2022 at 01:45 pm.

4:06 PM Prosecuting attorney DeShea D. Morrow in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Paul Michael Pecore appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Bradley J. Schraven appeared by video for Paul Michael Pecore. 
Prelim quest/WOR efilied - Atty Schraven satisfied.
Def waives prelim
Court finds def freely waives prelim
Def bound over for trial 
Parties agree to arraignment today.
DA - just efiled info, tracks comp.
Atty Schraven - reviewed charges w/Deft, waives reading, enters n/g pleas, requests STC.
Court schedules w/parties.
4:15 pm
Status conference scheduled for May 25, 2022 at 03:30 pm.

records.descr: Application for specific judicial assign approved

records.addlTxt:
09:06 AM Defendant Paul Michael Pecore in court with attorney Bradley J. Schraven.  Defendant Paul Michael Pecore in custody.  DeShea D Morrow appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Paul Michael Pecore appeared by video means.
Court calls case.
Atty Schraven heard - has reviewed complaint with deft.
Deft understands.
Requests prelim.
Court schedules.
Deft heard.
Court approves deft to appear by ZOOM for prelim, if he is sent to prison.
9:08 AM
  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 27, 2022 at 04:00 pm.

11:42 AM Defendant Paul Michael Pecore in court with attorney Jon G Spansail.  Defendant Paul Michael Pecore in custody.  DeShea D. Morrow appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Paul Michael Pecore appeared by video means with Attorney.
Court calls case.
Atty Spansail is present from PD's office for bond purposes only.
Copy of Criminal Complaint.
Atty Spansail heard - deft understands charges and penalties.
DA heard on bond recommendations.
Atty Spansail heard on bond.
Deft heard.
Court imposes $20,000 cash bail w/ conditions; sign waiver of extradition, no possession or consumption of alcohol or controlled substances w/o a valid Rx, no operating a motor vehicle without a valid license. 
Deft to contact the Public Defenders office today.
Court schedules with parties.
11:46 AM
  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for April 18, 2022 at 08:30 am.
